content:
Abdullah Selim
Associate Product Manager
 abdalla.selim.97@gmail.com	 +201010114997	 503 Azza st, Zahraa Nasr City, Cairo, Egypt
 Linkedin   Github
Summary	
Results-driven Product Manager with a strong foundation in business strategy, entrepreneurship, and full-stack development. Skilled in identifying customer pain points, defining product strategies, and leveraging data-driven insights to drive growth. Adept at bridging the gap between technology and business, fostering cross-functional collaboration, and effectively communicating with stakeholders. Passionate about Lean Startup principles, Agile methodologies, and building scalable digital products that deliver real business impact.

Skills & Expertise	

Product Strategy & Roadmapping
Customer Research & Problem Validation
Agile & Scrum Methodologies
MVP Development & Lean Startup
Wireframing & Prototyping (Figma, Balsamiq)
Data Analytics & Metrics (SQL, Google Analytics)
Market Research & Competitive Analysis
Technical Background (JavaScript, SQL, Node.js, Express.js)
Cross-functional Team Leadership

PROJECTS	
Tip Calculator                                                                                                                                  Jul 2024 – Nov 2024
Developed a responsive Tip Calculator application using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Designed an intuitive user interface to calculate tips based on the bill amount and selected tip percentage.
Implemented features for dynamic tip calculation, including the ability to split the bill among multiple people.
Focused on user experience by adding input validation, real-time updates, and error handling.
Full Stack Web Application for Campground Reviews                                                              Dec 2023– Mar 2024
Developed and maintained a scalable web application using Node.js, TypeScript, and React.js.
Designed and optimized database schemas in MongoDB to ensure scalability and efficiency.
Applied OOP principles and design patterns for clean and reusable code.
Collaborated with a team to design a responsive front-end with React and integrated RESTful APIs.
Computerized Maintenance Management System (CMMS)                                                       Sep 2019– Jun 2020
Built a centralized desktop app for tracking maintenance activities and data handling.
Designed the system architecture to integrate with a mobile app for real-time updates.
Implemented structured backend services and APIs using NestJS.
Employed message queues to handle asynchronous tasks, ensuring seamless operations.
PROFESSIONAL  EXPERIENCE	
PACS/RIS Implementer - Millensys Software                                                                                         Nov 2024 – Present
Deployed PACS/RIS solutions, optimizing radiology workflow for hospitals and clinics.
Conducted user training & onboarding, ensuring seamless adoption and reducing support tickets by 76%.
Collaborated with the development team to address customer pain points by translating user feedback into actionable solutions.
Engaged in on-site communication with clients to gather insights, identify challenges, and implement innovative solutions tailored to their needs.





Full Stack Web Developer - Freelance                                                                                                     Mar 2024 – Present
Developed and launched custom web applications for clients using JavaScript, Node.js, Mongo db, and React.js.
Designed and optimized RESTful APIs and database structures, ensuring efficient backend performance.
Collaborated with clients to understand business requirements, delivering solutions that improved efficiency and user engagement.
Built responsive and scalable applications, enhancing user experience and increasing client satisfaction.
Managed end-to-end project lifecycle, from requirement gathering to deployment and maintenance.


Senior Technical Support Engineer - IDG                                                                                          Apr 2021 – Nov 2024 
Provided L1 & L2 technical support for healthcare imaging software and dental imaging machines, achieving a 98% customer satisfaction score.
Perform  Diagnosed and resolved technical issues, reducing system downtime by 95%.
EDUCATION	
Bachelor of Biomedical Engineering                                                                                                    Aug 2016 – Apr 2021
Mansoura University
Courses & Certifications	
Agile Product Management.

Lean Startup & MVP Development.

Google Analytics for Product Managers.
Tools & Technologies	
Product Management: Jira, Trello, Notion, Miro
Prototyping & Design: Figma, Balsamiq
Data & Analytics: SQL, Google Analytics, Mixpan
Development: JavaScript, Node.js, Express.js, SQL Server
LANGUAGES	
Arabic (Native)
English (Proficient)
